import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-library', template: `

Aucune piste n'a été ajoutée

{{ track.title }}

{{ track.artist }}

` }) export class LibraryComponent { tracks: any[] = []; // Will be replaced with actual Track interface openAddTrackDialog() { console.log('Opening add track dialog from library'); } }
